Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations or personal needs. Given its high value and quality, it is worth $8,000 to both of us. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $7,200. This special offer is tailored to recognize your interest and commitment to excellence. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
